section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:

para.text: "DOES" means the Department of Employment Services.
"DSLBD" means the Department of Small and Local Business Development.
"Fund" means the Incarceration to Incorporation Entrepreneurship Fund established by § 2-1210.53
"IIEP" means the Incarceration to Incorporation Entrepreneurship Program established by § 2-1210.52
